website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for consumers who prefer a longer hose. It's well-made for the price and fairly easy to maneuver for a long hose.
pros: A lightweight 75-foot model that expands nicely
Longer length is great for big yards
Comes with accessories, including an 8-pattern nozzle and brass connectors
cons: Just like other models in its class, some reports of leaks after a few uses have been noted

customer_reviews.title: Great hose!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm really pleased with this hose! It comes in a decent little bag, easy to hang up for storage and it really doesn't take up much space! The nozzle has several functions on it, so that is handy as well. My daughter just couldn't believe how long the hose expanded to. This will really help with their chores, watering our animals, and then later this summer when we need to water the garden - no big, bulky hose to lug around! I've just to watch my dog around it, because he thought it was a toy when we went to use it. :o)
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Y Fisher

customer_reviews.title: NO LONGER HAPPY!!
customer_reviews.text: So far this is holding up well and seems to be made with quality materials. Have had about 3 months now & use to water plants & yard daily or every other day. UPDATE: WELL THE QUALITY I PREVIOUSLY SPOKE OF NO LONGER EXISTS. ALL OF A SUDDEN THE HOSE IS LEAKING IN NUMEROUS PLACES & WHEN I SAY LEAKING, I MEAN POURING!! WE HAVE TAKEN GREAT CARE TO LET ALL EXCESS WATER OUT & PUT HOSE UP WHEN WE ARE DONE & IT HAS NOT GONE OVER ROUGH SURFACES, SO NOT SURE WHY THIS HAS HAPPENED. VERY DISAPPOINTED IN THIS PRODUCT & WILL NOT PURCHASE AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing space saving hose! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This hose is awesome! I wanted a hose to use for my front flower beds and potted plants but that wouldn't be a pain to roll up every time. Reels are expensive, so I thought I'd try this hose out. Comes with a storage bag, multi-function nozzle, and 2 washers. I couldn't believe how small it coils up to! Quickly expands with water pressure and then condenses back to normal size when finished. What a time and space-saver! Nozzle attachment has 8 different spray types and also works great. I think I'll be coming back for the 100 ft hose for my backyard!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, brass fittings, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I love that this hose has brass fittings. At 100' long expanded, it is long enough to reach around my entire house from the rear spigot. It is definitely worth the extra $4 for another 25' of hose. When I'm not using the hose, I store it in a plastic flower pot under the spigot. I have used the hose with a sprinkler, a Miracle Gro feeder, and a hand-held trigger sprayer, and it works perfectly! To help not crush my flowers, I put hose stakes at the edges of my garden around the perimeter of my house. I will also be storing it in my shed over the late fall/winter seasons. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ram321

customer_reviews.title: So far, excellent product and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this hose and sprayer a short time, but so far I love it! It does exactly as promised and the quality seems to be very good - time will tell!! I love that it is lightweight, retracts into a small space. The fittings seems robust and everything is very easy to use. I definitely do recommend this product. For my own overall use, I probably prefer the 25 foot length, but 50 feet also works and I am sure I will get plenty of use out of this hose - as long as the quality holds up! And the seller is very responsive, checking on how it was working for me. I appreciate that!
customer_reviews.author: Marva

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hose
customer_reviews.text: I love the green color. I also love it is a expandable hose so when not full of water very lightweight and easy to move and store. It has a bag to store it in and the hose dries fairly quickly and easily goes back inside. It works like any other hose, holds pressure and is firm. Its 50 feet. I do wish they came in larger lengths as I have a large yard but it is easy enough to hook two hoses together.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy hose. It comes in its own little bag an a sprayer. I havent had much reason to use it so far, to much rain an snow. But when i have used it, it has been great. My favorite thing is it doesnt leak. The last hose leaked no matter what i did. It expands far enough for me to spray my drive way and sidewalks and still water the plants. All in all a good hose.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice hose
customer_reviews.text: I have a number of hoses. Big heavy duty hoses for the garden. I wanted something a bit more lightweight and not so cumbersome for up around the house to water the flowers and fill the cat bowl. I was impressed by the fittings on this and the included nozzle is pretty decent. It expands just like advertised when you use it and doesn't take up a whole bunch of room when you're not. I found it easy to tuck away when I was done. Nice hose.
customer_reviews.author: FLattyFrog

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Yet Flexible
customer_reviews.text: This hose is lightweight yet very sturdy. It has a nice bag to keep it in when you need to transport it or just keep it for the off season. The nozzle is has many options such as flat, full, shower, center, vertical, mist, stream, center and cone. It has an easy to grip handle. The hose itself is strong unlike others I have purchased. It is convenient to store as it does not take up a lot of space when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Cramsey

customer_reviews.title: NOT DURABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Only had this hose for one month and it sprung multiple leaks from tiny holes along the length of the product. I missed the return option by 3 days. I feel ripped off.😔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to store away
customer_reviews.text: This garden hose is such a space saver. I like that I don't struggle to put it away. I can just unscrew and pack in its own travel bag. I used to leave the straight hose hooked because it was annoying to put away and now I dont have to do that. The twist helps so that it does not create creases that block the water from coming out. The sprayer is a plus. I use it for my potted plants and washing my dog outside. I recommend this hose a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly79

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this garden hose. It is flexible, strong, light weight and does not kink. The only suggestion I have for buyers is to buy the next size up from what is needed. The hose extends to its full length when water pressure builds up but when one begins to water plants/lawn the hose shrinks. Otherwise it is perfect! I have a 50 foot and two75 foot hoses. They are strong and durable. I drag them over cement and decking. No leaks or damage to the hoses. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: beachsmores

customer_reviews.title: See below.
customer_reviews.text: You cannot stretch it out and lay it on the ground to water a plant because it retracts. The hose has to be secured in some way so that it does not retract. I have only one water spigot in my backyard so anything I have to water on the far side of the yard I have to hold the hose or secure it (e.g., hook it onto a branch) so it will stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Louise A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Light, durable, stretches and retracts ...great garden hose
customer_reviews.text: Had bought this brand a couple of years ago as a gift and it is still working great! Was thrilled to find the same hose is back in stock on Amazon. This hose outlasts every hose I have bought, I live in the desert so hoses do not last long in the heat and with frequent use. The last Glayko is over 3 years old and is out all 4 seasons. Will buy another for front yard.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been tired of the regular hoses you can buy. They are so bulky and take up so much space, basically requiring you to spend more on a stand to wrap them. This hose is perfect, and expands further. Very well made. It comes in a bag to store it, making it to where you don’t need a lot of space for it. It’s nice that it comes with the sprayer already. Great for gardening, which I’ll be doing a lot of, and great for many other things. I would definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerrica

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hose on July 19th, as of Sept 23rd hose is done. I had high hopes for this hose but it just did not hold up, as some of the reviews did say.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for "sometiming" yard worker!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hose hoping it would be easier to put away and not be a hassle. Let me tell you all "this hose is awesome". I just cut the water off and it shrinks back down to where my 4 year old and I can pack it back down. I hate doing anything with water hoses because they are bulky and hard to handle. This bad boy gets and A+. My dog will be able to get her bath outside again!!!
customer_reviews.author: LBarker

customer_reviews.title: It is very light and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: As of right now I like it very much. I have problems with my hands, have a bad back, and nephropathy in my feet and hands. It is easy for me to use it, as far as durability I don't know yet as it is only hooked up 5 or 6 days. UPDATE It ruptured after two months of occasional use. I wish I didn't throw out my old, heavy hose. This one was a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: A GOOD BUY
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our use, love that it has solid brass fittings. This hose does not retract as tightly as other similar hoses I've seen, but I suspect it is because it has a more durable core. It's perfect for us: light enough to carry and move around for pool maintenance, and it comes in a really nice drawstring bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this July 4.We thought for the money it would at least survive the rest of a Vegas summer. August 19 I was watering our tree and noticed the patio was wet. It was under warranty until August 13. It sprung a leak about 5 ft from the spray nozzle. I was very disappointed. Loved not having to roll it up and it was very light. If only it had lasted 2-3 months.
customer_reviews.author: LEONARD P GRIM

customer_reviews.title: Compact for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I got the 25' hose because I have a small 6 x 12' atrium. I have been watering my plants with a watering can which is tedious. I got this hose to use there. I got the watering done in 1/3 of the time. It remains to be seen how sturdy it is. It's the perfect size and winds up small which is what I wanted. Speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Noahs' mother

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help me water my newly planted grass. It's been easy to use and move, light weight, and just gets the job done. The different settings on the sprayer are very handy. The one thing I would note is depending on which setting you do use, you don't get the full 100 ft. When using the Shower setting for example I noticed that the hose contracts and shortens by maybe 5-10 feet. Very happy with my purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hose!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this comes with a storage bag! I don’t like to leave the hose out since we have kids who love to play in the water but often leave it on which brings me to the next nice thing which is the sturdy shut off on the spray nozzle! Very durable hose that coils back up when done using! I for sure recommend this for the upcoming summer!
customer_reviews.author: Tara J Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Best flexible hose
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best flexible hose we've bought over 10 years of find this type of product. There's just something unique about the covering of the hose that makes it really easy to manage and we are on our 2nd one because we like the 1st 1 so much and it has lasted for years. A fittings are solid brass.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Gibb

customer_reviews.title: Busted without ever using it
customer_reviews.text: This hose is terrible; i have it in my backyard and have barely used it... when I tried to use it after about 6 months, all the water is leaking and nothing is coming out of the hose. Jeez, I wish I had tried it more within my return time frame so that i could return this junk.
customer_reviews.author: rrlamichhane

customer_reviews.title: Great hose, but.......
customer_reviews.text: I love this hose. It is light weight and easy to move around. So much better than rubber or plastic hoses. The only problem is it can NOT be left on a hot surface, like a driveway for too long. This is my second hose cause the material it is made from was compromised when left laying on the asphalt driveway. When my first hose broke ran up to hardware store and bought plastic replacement. I hated it: heavy, it kinked, etc. Jumped on line to get another Glayko. So much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length for all my watering needs
customer_reviews.text: While I have only used this for abouta week or so, I can't believe the difference from a standard hose. This is lightweight and so much easier to water with. Has cut my watering time in half! No more dragging a heavy hose across the yard. I hope they durability is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Broke in 4 months and I had to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Breezyoct9

customer_reviews.title: Love the convenience of this hose!!
customer_reviews.text: I broke my last hose and needed to find a new one and for this price I couldn't lose. The hose has a spray attachment that has different settings so if you are cleaning your car or watering your garden it has you covered. The best part is I didn't have to worry about it kinking up on me. The storage bag was a plus. I have to say that it exceeded my expectations!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Marzuolo

customer_reviews.title: Best hose ever
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this hose. This is great for watering my flowers or washing my car. It expands with water pressure and then shrinks back to normal size when finished. I love the storage bag. This hose does not get tangled up like my other hose. It also comes with a nozzle to adjust the water.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Much more durable
customer_reviews.text: Replacing another brand of expandable hose that was missing quality of this new hose ,yet surprisingly cost about the same. This surely seems much more durable ; the brass fittings are an obvious huge improvement. 0nly time will tell, but from first impression, this is a great buy. Appreciate seller’s interest in customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: JJ LO

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This hose is pretty cool. Much lighter weight compared to regular hoses. It also much easier to wind up and what not. The length is pretty cool. It seems pretty durable, but I won’t know for sure until it’s been sitting outside for a minute. But overall seems great
customer_reviews.author: Malaina Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Best hose I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one two years ago. It is so easy to store between uses. Turn off the water, let the hose drain - it shrinks as it self drains - , and it fits in a 14" flower pot. There is no need for reels, or trying to wrestle with the hose to store it. I just bought a second one for our community garden. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Hommel

customer_reviews.title: It dose not work.
customer_reviews.text: Less than a week, it has a hole on it. I missed the window to returned it with in a day. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A.

customer_reviews.title: Love these hoses
customer_reviews.text: After years of lugging heavy rubber hoses around the yard, I finally found this product which makes watering the garden beds so much easier. This is the second one I bought, the first being a 75 footer. So much lighter and easier to store.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: The GREATEST expandable hose on the market!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best expandable hose on the market. I just bought a third one for a family member and they love it too. It's pretty tough, I've been using the same one for three summers now, and no leaks or problems. Great hose!
customer_reviews.author: Quill

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in as expected. So far so good. Previous one, from a different brand, broke by the hose connector after about 8 months of light use. Hopefully this one will be of a better quality.
customer_reviews.author: vitalxs

customer_reviews.title: Love this hose
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this hose just about a week now and I love it. It is so easy to move around and it has all the settings I need for various plants. It’s a much better quality also than the other hoses of this kind I’ve ordered before.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Shank

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Looks very well made. I purchased a different brand a few year back and hose broke after like 5 times. This one has so far lasted with no issues. I have used it about 20 times over the last 6 months. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Shaw

customer_reviews.title: too fragile
customer_reviews.text: Any sharp item the hose rolls across (such as a board splinter, or a thorn from roses or a bush can cause a leak and loss of use of the hose, I like the ease of use and have ordered the new black hose. It has performed well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer. ron

customer_reviews.title: This Green Glayko
customer_reviews.text: Holds up extremely well. I'm in Arizona and this thing gets used almost daily. It won't last forever (second one now after 2 years) but the convenience makes it worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Bob H

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and store.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quickly dispatched hose that stays out of the way. This is exactly that. I't's brand new but seems tough enough. Hopefully won't need another one of these for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Sellars

customer_reviews.title: Great hose, doesn't leak!
customer_reviews.text: I got this after my old hose got dried out and cracked and have been very happy so far. It fits tightly onto the faucet and I haven't had any issues with leaks. I also love how compact it is and that it comes with a storage bag!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl R.

customer_reviews.title: Great hose!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic hose. I love that it came with the sprayer which makes watering my garden really easy. I love that it's fabric and not stiff like traditional hoses. It seems durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Erica G

customer_reviews.title: Trash!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these in May of 2019... one exploded in September.. today is March 1st, 2020 and the second one has exploded.. Save your money buy a real hose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I used it only once so far, but was very happy with the ease with which I could easily reach all my plants around the yard. The light weight of the hose in use was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: GMUMB

customer_reviews.title: Leaking in the middle
customer_reviews.text: I first like the hose but i gave 3 star because the hose was used for about 1 month and to my surprise it start to leak in the middle and i have to condemn it
customer_reviews.author: liztoy

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: One year and it’s leaking from the nozzle and where the hose connects to the nozzle. Great concept, but apparently not tested with rigor.
customer_reviews.author: Kei Sasaki

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Seemed pretty good at first, but after a handful of uses, it started to leak. I tried to investigate to see where the hole was and realized the hose itself (underneath the green covering) was just a super thin rubber, so not surprised by the leak. I reached out for a replacement and was denied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Did Not Last!
customer_reviews.text: The hose did not even last 6 months! It sprung several leaks and was useless! Too bad as it was so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Satterly

customer_reviews.title: Can’t survive outside
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these in the last year, and each time they end up with small leaks after a month or so. They are not built to survive being left outside with the water set up to run once you flip the switch at the end, which is a pretty nifty feature actually. This will be a great product if they can figure out durability.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: After Buying Four of These I'm Sold
customer_reviews.text: I was so satisfied with the first two hoses I purchased that I bought two more for the back grotto of my property. Nothing is perfect, but this is the best watering hose I've ever used, and that's "practically" speaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hose
customer_reviews.text: Extremely lightweight and durable so far, LOVE the on/off switch. Bit of a learning curve in use though...when you increase the water pressure, the hose length shortens.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy B

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I use this inside to wash containers. It only lasted a few months before it leaked. It was barely used.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for the daycare I work at and I lived it so much I bought another one for myself. It is very light weight and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Teamdiaz5

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Love this hose its so easy and light weight. I ordered a different brand that was cheaper it didn't hold up. So I ordered another one of these. I recommend buying this hose.
customer_reviews.author: W Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Very good hose. Quality is awesome! I like how small it is to store. It’s crazy how much it expands to. I will definitely be recommending this to others!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. it is easy to use and so much less cumbersome than the average garden hose. What a difference for people who cant lug a big hose around the yard. This makes watering as easy as its probably ever going to get. It looks good, super lightweight yet strong, and doesn't take up half the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Hose broke inside the green material.  Hand sprayer leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Hose was used in a greenhouse and not exposed to elements and was not stretched much. Hose inside the green fabric covering broke/split June 1st, 2020. Hand sprayer has leaked from the beginning. I would not call this product "super strong construction' as the Seller does. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Argyle Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: This hose is great...very compact but expands to twice its size once the faucet is turned on. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: 3 months...
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months, the hose bursted! At least I can say it worked great for those 3 months..... $26 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: Love how it expands and contracts when it's used. Long enough for the area I need it and small enough to store in a small plant pot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: This hose works like any other but it is amazingly light weight. It doesn't kink and can be stored in a very small area. Quite brilliant, really.
customer_reviews.author: C. Peckham

customer_reviews.title: Leaks slightly
customer_reviews.text: Best expandable hose I've owned. Leaks slightly but overall I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully will last. Most other brands dead and leaking before one year passes
customer_reviews.author: Nickolas zakharoff

customer_reviews.title: Not so durable
customer_reviews.text: Love it for the 3 months I had it before it broke. Split right open in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: sterling

customer_reviews.title: Great hose for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The hose expands and contracts as advertised. I like having the 75' length. Brightly colored so you won't trip on it. The connections are very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: It's light weight and easy to use, don't know about durability as it's recent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tony K.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Bought hose in May 2019. Used it less than 15 times. Hose blew out in October. No good now.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I have not used yet. just connected it to the spicot
customer_reviews.text: came with directions and I was able to connect it
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to roll up and unroll compared to other type of hose material. Good price and received on schedule.
customer_reviews.author: JERKEMAN

customer_reviews.title: The hose inside is thin and wimpy...
customer_reviews.text: I had this for a little over a week and it started leaking at a variety of places. Upon inspection, I saw that the hose inside is thin latex that is definitely not hose-worthy.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Corran

customer_reviews.title: Great hose
customer_reviews.text: Great hose, even though not the exact one I was looking for. Not as lightweight as the other flexihoses.
customer_reviews.author: davinci

customer_reviews.title: Light weigh
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Not sure of durability. Too new. Easy to use. Not so easy to rewind and rebag. So just put on a hose rack
customer_reviews.author: Mlynne7

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality/Price
customer_reviews.text: Got this garden hose for my college age son’s house rental. He says it works great! I didn't want to spend alot of money. Good quality and price!
customer_reviews.author: karen v

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hose long when you fill then shrink s down to a nice compact hose for storage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sprung leak after 7 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Trying to contact shipper or manufacturer. It says it is warranteed for a year but cannot contact anyone. Update. I do love the product and bought another one, hopefully it will last more than 7 months. Only thing I heard from seller is he wants a review.
customer_reviews.author: Disapointed

customer_reviews.title: Like this product
customer_reviews.text: This hose is so much easier to use and to move around my yard better then my old hose.
customer_reviews.author: Bette Langseth

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally impressed. I haven't had it long enough to judge durability though.
customer_reviews.author: R Russell

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like this hose. It's a hose. It carries water. It works good enough to leave a review. Ordinarily I don't leave reviews.
customer_reviews.author: adrien

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected for the price. Have only used it once so I cannot speak for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Packer Fan

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Please don't buy this product when I used no water pressure
customer_reviews.author: carlos lopez

customer_reviews.title: Finally a hose that doesn't kink!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a hose that doesn't kink!!! It does everything it promises! Extremely happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue48

customer_reviews.title: Not the durability I expected
customer_reviews.text: The hose sprung lots of holes and had to be discarded. I did not have the original packaging so I did not try to return it. It did not last a season before the hose started to leak. Sorry for the negative review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Now,that we took it out to attach and try it we are very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Susan Grona

customer_reviews.title: stretchable hose
customer_reviews.text: sorry guys it was my bad just updating my review that hose only last me little more then a month it start leaking in middle of it
customer_reviews.author: amandeep singh

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Our second purchase of this item. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JHS

customer_reviews.title: Burst inner tubing
customer_reviews.text: I have hardly used a 100 ft hose for less than 3 months and it is leaking big time rendering it useless. Looks like the inner tubing is burst and it is losing all the water.
customer_reviews.author: Suni

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for 9 months, then I turned it on my day and the hose completely shredded where it was secured to the faucet...shredded! Now I need to buy a new hose, not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Nyland

customer_reviews.title: This unit is a nice, lightweight unit, and it connected well.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it. I was able to get rid of the water in the hose after use before I stored it.
customer_reviews.author: kbuck

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely light and quick to set up. The worst part is the when your done and turn the water off it always has an issue with depressurization.
customer_reviews.author: tony tony

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy light weight hose at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hose last year for my garden out front and love it! I purchased a second one for my back yard just recently. My neighbor also asked where I got it. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been use this item for the last 3 weeks and it is working good so far. Let’s see how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Du B.

customer_reviews.title: It seems like a good quality hose.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a chance to use the hose 3 times for watering my plants and so far I really like it,and seems like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hose
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hose that I've ever had. Nice and light, stretches, easy to store, doesn't leak!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Leclaire

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I could not rate durability. Haven't had it long enough to determine that. We shall see!
customer_reviews.author: TERI L.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied, replaces my old heavy rubber hose, wish I bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: conrad kantor

customer_reviews.title: This product does not last for a season.
customer_reviews.text: This the 2nd hose I purchased and it springs leaks. After a short time. Would like it replaced or my funds refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Water leaks and sprays out of hose
customer_reviews.text: Saw a good review and bought this. Used for a couple of weeks and water started to leak and spray out of hose
customer_reviews.author: Wilfred M. Goh

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have use different brand name sand I like this one the best because it has brass fittings
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Glayko Tm 25 Feet Expandable Garden Hose -New 2019- Super Strong Construction - 3/4" Solid Brass Fittings - and Shut-Off Valve + 8 Function Spray Nozzle - Flexible Expanding Hose with Storage Bag
product_meta.description:
Size:25 FEET

GLAYKO EXPANDABLE GARDEN HOSE

 This hose has been upgraded to the highest quality available. It is made up of durable pressure-resistant latex material. This expanding hose is safe for average water pressure and will not burst or leak.

 Hose Length

The hose is capable of expanding to 3 times of its length with water and it contracts to its original length when the water is released. Once the hose contracts it is small for convenient space saving storage.

 Brass Connectors

 Solid Brass fitting for durability and to avoid any leakage. It can be connected to any spray nozzle, sprinkler, or another hose.

 Specifications

 Length: 8 feet,
Expanding Length: 25 feet
Inner Hose: Double layer TPS
Water Pressure:0.4-0.6pa
Max Water Pressure: 1.2-1.5mpa
Diameter of the valve：3/4 inch

Package Includes

* 25ft Expandable Hose
* 8 Functions Nozzle
* 2 spare washers
* Storage bag

 Best quality hose—Our guarantee your satisfaction

12 Month Warranty for Manufacturing Defects, Contact Seller via Amazon for claims

You can order your new flexible and expandable garden hose just by clicking the "add to cart" button now!
feature_bullets: Strongest Expandable Garden Hose with Nozzle and shut off Valve, Premium Quality: The solid brass fittings ensure strongest durability, corrosion resistance, and prevent leakage
Flexibility: The hose can expand up to 3 times of its original length. When the water is released it contracts to its original size for easy storage.
Lightweight: and Portable: Very lightweight weighs about 2.00 lb. The bonus storage bag makes carrying even easier.
Durability: Our well-built hose is designed to work with a minimum water pressure of 4 bars (60PSI) and a maximum of 8 bars (115 PSI), with 6 bars (85 PSI) optimum.
Bonus add in: This high standard expandable hose comes with a high quality spray nozzle with 8 adjustable patterns
